items.label: Join Colleagues for Lunch
items.description: Don't eat alone at your desk.

items.label: Morning Greetings
items.description: Say hello to everyone when you arrive. Don't sneak in.

items.label: Analyze your Payslip
items.description: Understand where the taxes go and check your meal vouchers.

items.label: Plan Your Holidays
items.description: You likely have 20+ days. Belgians plan summer holidays in January. Do the same.
